channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 20:32 Air alarm to Cherkasy district observe further messages.
item.description: 游댮 20:32 Air alarm to Cherkasy district observe further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Kharkiv Territorial Community and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
